content.description: Short, and stout. Don't think too hard about it. It's all in the beta.
content.location: Directly right of The Light of E채rendil.

content.description: Invert at the protruding boulder, start in a chicken wing and swing around for some easy upsidedown shuffling, pull into the baggy fists for a cruxy top out.
content.protection: Pads, Spotters, long arms and wide hands.
content.location: Scramble through the weathertop boulders until you nearly reach the rim. Come to a small clearing with some obvious rocks moved around to create a level-ish surface. The fist crack should be fairly obvious.

content.description: Super cool upsidedown climbing with a fun jug halfway through. Hands, fists, and feet all go above your head, with the beautiful and illuminating light of E채rendil to guide you in dark places, when all other lights go out.
content.location: Follow Shelob's Lair back into a corner where three boulders converge. Sting is directly in front of you, and The Light of E채rendil is to your left.

content.description: Fun little pockets for your hands and perfect feet make this a clean and fun invert offwidth boulder problem. Turn the lip with good jugs and sit up to a bomber top-out jug. Don't look down, and don't fall on the death spike.
content.protection: At least two pads, spotters, Boromir
content.location: Head up the slabs towards the white rim layer. For Gone Door is the obvious wide splitter on the right-hand side of the amphitheater.
